fr.texte: L'homme est bon, mais le veau est meilleur.
Chaque repas que l'on fait est un repas de moins à faire.
La gourmandise commence quand on n'a plus faim.

it.texte: Nella botte piccola, c’è il vino buono.

en.texte: There is no love sincerer than the love of food.
The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
Everything you see I owe to spaghetti.
After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations.
